Key Match Events: Jusuf Nurkic made a decisive free throw with 0.8 seconds left to secure the win for the Phoenix Suns
Post-Match Reflections: The Phoenix Suns improved to 8-1 for the first time since the 2009-10 season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns' reserves outscored the Dallas Mavericks' bench 28-9 after a 23-9 edge in the first meeting
Others: The game was played in Dallas, and Phoenix center Jusuf Nurkic had 15 points and 10 rebounds
